# 7.0 Docs

> Documentation for 7.0 Docs.

- [Breaking change: API controller actions try to infer parameters from DI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/api-controller-action-parameters-di.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where API controller actions try to infer parameters from DI.
- [Breaking change: AuthenticateAsync for remote auth providers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/authenticateasync-anonymous-request.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where AuthenticateAsync for remote authentication providers no longer fails if there is no current user.
- [Breaking change: Default authentication scheme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/default-authentication-scheme.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where a singly registered authentication scheme will cause it to be used as the default.
- [Breaking change: ASPNET-prefixed environment variable precedence](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/environment-variable-precedence.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where ASPNET-prefixed environment variables now have the lowest precedence for WebApplicationBuilder.
- [Breaking change: Fallback file endpoints](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/fallback-file-endpoints.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where endpoints configured with 'MapFallbackToFile()' now only match 'HEAD' and 'GET' requests.
- [Breaking change: Kestrel: Default HTTPS binding removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/https-binding-kestrel.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where the default HTTPS binding on Kestrel was removed.
- [Breaking change: IHubClients and IHubCallerClients hide members](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/ihubclients-ihubcallerclients.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where IHubClients and IHubCallerClients hide two interface members.
- [Breaking change: Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.Libuv and libuv.dll removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/libuv-transport-dll-removed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Transport.Libuv and libuv.dll have been removed.
- [Breaking change: Event IDs for some Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Core log messages changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/microsoft-aspnetcore-mvc-core-log-event-ids.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where event IDs for some Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Core log messages changed.
- [Breaking change: Microsoft.Data.SqlClient updated to 4.0.1](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/microsoft-data-sqlclient-updated-to-4-0-1.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where Microsoft.Data.SqlClient has been updated to 4.0.1.
- [Breaking change: Middleware no longer defers to endpoint with null request delegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/middleware-null-requestdelegate.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where the file-serving middleware no longer no-op when the active endpoint has a null request delegate.
- [Breaking change: MVC's detection of an empty body in model binding changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/mvc-empty-body-model-binding.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where MVC's detection of an empty body in model binding changed.
- [Breaking change: Output caching API changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/output-caching-renames.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where changes were made to some output caching APIs.
- [Breaking change: SignalR Hub methods try to resolve parameters from DI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/signalr-hub-method-parameters-di.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where SignalR Hub methods try to resolve parameters from DI.
- [Breaking change: Authentication in WebAssembly apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/7.0/wasm-app-authentication.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 7.0 where authentication in WebAssembly apps relies on the history state instead of the URL query string.
